title: Hill Dwarf
entryLore: Hill dwarves possess keen senses, deep intuition, and remarkable resilience. More connected to the surface world than their subterranean kin, they often build settlements into highlands. Their culture emphasizes wisdom and endurance, following the standard ancestral traditions of all dwarves.

traits.name: Dwarven Toughness
traits.description: Your [[hit_points|Hit Point]] maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 again whenever you gain a level.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.description: You have [[resistance|Resistance]] to [[poison_damage|Poison damage]] and [[advantage|Advantage]] on saves against the [[poisoned_condition|Poisoned condition]].
